index.madeWith: MADE WITH A CONSCIENCE TO THE WORLD
index.materialsDesc: We use only premium, food-grade stainless steel and BPA-free materials. Every product is designed with durability and safety in mind, ensuring your wellness journey is built on a solid foundation.
index.sustainabilityDesc: Our commitment to the planet drives every decision. From recyclable packaging to carbon-neutral shipping, we're dedicated to reducing our environmental footprint while helping you reduce yours.
index.customizationDesc: Your wellness journey is unique, and your products should be too. Choose from a range of colors, sizes, and configurations to find the perfect fit for your lifestyle.
index.convenienceDesc: Designed for life on the go. Our products feature easy-clean designs, leak-proof seals, and portable sizes that fit seamlessly into your daily routine.
shop.title: Shop Thrive
shop.subtitle: Premium wellness products designed for those who demand more from life.
about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We dreamt it, we built it, and we shipped it.
about.storyText: Thrive started with a simple frustration: the wellness industry was full of empty promises. We set out to create something differentâ€”pure ingredients, real science, actual results. No shortcuts, no compromises. Based in Aurora, Illinois, we've been here for one year and counting, building a wellness revolution one product at a time.
about.joinThousands: Join thousands who've made the switch to wellness that works.
